name: TableRow
description: Represents a row in a table.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: index
properties.description: Returns the index number of the row within the rows collection of the table. Zero-indexed.

properties.name: values
properties.description: Represents the raw values of the specified range. The data returned could be of type string, number, or a boolean. Cell that contain an error will return the error string.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Returns the range object associated with the entire row.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the row from the table.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
